days.text: **Remembering** the wonderful **‘Thy Kingdom Come’** prayer week last month, we ask God to fill us with that same enthusiasm and hunger for prayer. May our churches come alive with prayer and praise and may our own prayer lives grow each day.

We pray today for all those who volunteer in charity shops in our area.  As these people help to support good causes, offer sensible recycling and provide affordable clothes and household goods, we thank God that they so generously give their time.

Pray for the Anglican clergy in Kent who were ordained on June 29th at Canterbury Cathedral. May they be blessed in their ministry and made strong in faith as they continue to lead and teach in our churches.

Pray for the Anglican clergy in Kent who were ordained on June 29th at Canterbury Cathedral. May they be blessed in their ministry and made strong in faith as they continue to lead and teach in our churches.

**Pray** for the Anglican! clergy in Kent who were ordained on June 29th at Canterbury Cathedral. May they be blessed in their ministry and made strong in faith as they continue to lead and teach in our churches.

**Pray** for the **Anglican!** clergy in Kent who were ordained on June 29th at Canterbury Cathedral. May they be blessed in their ministry and made strong in faith as they continue to lead and teach in our churches.
